channel.title: Need help
channel.description:
i need to make like the title of the client all mine and stuff and if i log on to reg owners acc it says (for ::yell) epic owner (name) and what i said but i want different name to say that
(if confusing i want every thing to say this different accs name)
i can show u soon makeing pics and vid
edit) its 317 server

item.title: Need help
item.dc:creator: @Music8 Music8
item.description:
@Music8 wrote:

I tried the yell thing and the other suggestion but it has a whole bunch of crap and I have to go through it all? Just looking for this one thing?

Read full topic

item.title: Need help
item.dc:creator: @99range_k0 99range k0
item.description:
@99range_k0 wrote:

[quote=“Music8, post:3, topic:341433”]i am loading vid but it says for reg owner acc if i yell

“the mighty beast owner” and name

i want to change the big owner name so something else " bye else i mean different username

here is vid its blury because its still prossesing


Please choose your word choice more carefully when attempting to explain things, I had to re-read this to understand, and I don’t know if I exactly understand it all. But anyways for the yell thing, go into client.java(server sided, so in your source) and search for co-owner. Keep clicking next until you see something similar to yell or something like that. Just replace the name Co-owner with Owner.

Read full topic

item.title: Need help
item.dc:creator: @Music8 Music8
item.description:

i am loading vid but it says for reg owner acc if i yell

item.title: Need help
item.dc:creator: @99range_k0 99range k0
item.description:
@99range_k0 wrote:

Client Sided :
Go to your clients folder, load up gui.java and search for the name you want to get rid of, then replace it with your name when you find it. Do the same with client.java in the same folder.
Server Sided :
Go to your source, and load up client.java and do the same thing as above.
There are other places it could be, but these are just the main places.

Read full topic
